name: 24 scenes of an evening coming of age. an advent calendar.
name_original: 24 scenes of an evening coming of age. an advent calendar.
description:
This advent calendar was made within 3 days for the Secret Santa Jam 2022 and is dedicated to Mavity. It's supposed to be a loosely connected demo for a "short" more humorous 3D point-and-click-adventure (with a completely different atmosphere & vibe to it lol) that I initially wanted to make, but I gave up after 5 days, because I figured I can't make these complex mechanics with dialogue etc (the writing is gonna be good & gay tho!) within this short amount of time. But it will definitely be released in 2023 or sth. :)

The first/initial door of this calendar was inspired by a scene from the third part of a screenplay triptych that I wrote in June 2022.
